name: BoltStorm
description:
Boltstorm is a game developed during Ludum Dare 34 game jam. It is about a Knight that ventures into the dungeon to save his fellow knights, but instead he gets trapped and is attacked by merciless executioners!

Theme of BoltStorm is growing. Goal is to Save the knights, and as your chain grows stronger survive the attack.

If you like BoltStorm, rate it here:
http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=preview&uid=46151
